attributes.action: Debate a vote for a vote of no confidence on the prime minister David Cameron.
attributes.additional_details:
Shared from Sky News: PM Evaded Question But Has Not Avoided Damage http://news.sky.com/story/1674737/pm-evaded-question-but-has-not-avoided-damage

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/resign-david-cameron-calls-pm-7713837

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/panama-papers-david-cameron-admits-he-did-have-a-stake-in-father-ian-camerons-offshore-investment-a6973586.html
attributes.background:
The prime minister has lost the trust of the British public due to his handling of the disclosure of his past financial history. 

Whilst this may have been a personal matter to start of. It was his past moral statements to gain the high ground that called into question his fitness to lead.
